contentType.label: application/jsonEnter data in the JSON format, as a string or using a data structure.

inputMethod.label: JSON stringEnter the JSON body as a raw text string. If values contain JSON reserved characters, you must escape them manually.

authenticationType.label: No authenticationUse when no credentials are required for the request.

mapper.subject: Job Request {{10.call.call_analysis.custom_analysis_data.caller_address}}

notes.content: Trigger an immediate outbound call to the on-call emergency agent.
Update the call record to reflect that an emergency escalation attempt has occurred.
Notify the on-call technician or dispatcher of an emergency service request.
This path is triggered when the customer choice indicates a request for the next available service appointment.
Prepare a structured request body for initiating an outbound emergency call through Retell AI.

The scenario routes execution only if a caller phone number is present.

This prevents incomplete or malformed call records from triggering escalation logic.

Once validated, the scenario splits into two primary paths:

  • Emergency escalation path
  • Non-emergency callback path
Persist the intake call data for tracking, retries, and downstream reference.
Receives call completion payloads from Retell AI after an intake call concludes.
